app.name: (Ethernet) PubSub/MQTT sample project
app.description: This demonstration illustrates PubSub functionality using AWS services with Ethernet connection.

RXC CK-RX65N

src/application_code/ports 10
name false pkcs11
src/application_code/ports 10
name true ota_pal
f
configuration/samples/common/ck-rx65n/ether/CK-RX65N_ether_scfg.ftl
RXC CK-RX65N
SU SI R_1 B_2 R RPFRAM2 0x00000004
C_FIRMWARE_UPDATE_CONTROL_BLOCK C_FIRMWARE_UPDATE_CONTROL_BLOCK_MIRROR 0x00100000
C_PKCS11_STORAGE* 0x00100800
B_ETHERNET_BUFFERS* B_RX_DESC* B_TX_DESC* B B_1 R_2 0x00800000
PResetPRG C_1 C_2 C C$* D* W* L P PFRAM PFRAM2 0xFFF00300
EXCEPTVECT 0xFFFEFF80
RESETVECT 0xFFFEFFFC
PFRAM2=RPFRAM2
RXC CK-RX65N DEXRAM=REXRAM DEXRAM_1=REXRAM_1 DEXRAM_2=REXRAM_2
com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.base.compiler com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.compiler.option.gOptimize true
com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.base.assembler com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.assembler.option.goptimize true
com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.base.linker com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.linker.option.optimize com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.linker.option.optimize.all
com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.base.converter com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.converter.option.separated.form.motorolaFile com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.converter.option.outputHexFile true
RXC ctype.h math.h mathf.h stdio.h stdlib.h string.h new.h fenv.h inttypes.h ctype.h wchar.h wctype.h
RXC CK-RX65N MBEDTLS_CONFIG_FILE="<aws_mbedtls_config.h>" CONFIG_MEDTLS_USE_AFR_MEMORY MBEDTLS_CMAC_C MBEDTLS_ERROR_C MBEDTLS_THREADING_C MBEDTLS_ALLOW_PRIVATE_ACCESS __LITTLE_ENDIAN__

f
configuration/samples/common/ck-rx65n/cellular/CK-RX65N_cellular_scfg.ftl
RXC CK-RX65N
SU SI R_1 B_2 R RPFRAM2 0x00000004
C_FIRMWARE_UPDATE_CONTROL_BLOCK C_FIRMWARE_UPDATE_CONTROL_BLOCK_MIRROR 0x00100000
C_PKCS11_STORAGE* 0x00100800
B_ETHERNET_BUFFERS* B_RX_DESC* B_TX_DESC* B B_1 R_2 0x00800000
PResetPRG C_1 C_2 C C$* D* W* L P PFRAM PFRAM2 0xFFF00300
PFRAM2=RPFRAM2
RXC CK-RX65N DEXRAM=REXRAM DEXRAM_1=REXRAM_1 DEXRAM_2=REXRAM_2
com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.base.compiler com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.compiler.option.gOptimize true
com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.base.assembler com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.assembler.option.goptimize true
com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.base.linker com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.linker.option.optimize com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.linker.option.optimize.all
com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.base.converter com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.converter.option.separated.form.motorolaFile com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.converter.option.outputHexFile true
RXC ctype.h math.h mathf.h stdio.h stdlib.h string.h new.h fenv.h inttypes.h ctype.h wchar.h wctype.h
RXC CK-RX65N MBEDTLS_CONFIG_FILE="<aws_mbedtls_config.h>" CONFIG_MEDTLS_USE_AFR_MEMORY MBEDTLS_CMAC_C MBEDTLS_ERROR_C MBEDTLS_THREADING_C MBEDTLS_ALLOW_PRIVATE_ACCESS __LITTLE_ENDIAN__
